lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Clinton Kane/Martijn Garritsen/Jonny Coffer/Jake Torrey/Steve Rusch/Oskar Rindborg
[00:00.030] 作曲 : Clinton Kane/Martijn Garritsen/Jonny Coffer/Jake Torrey/Steve Rusch/Mikky Ekko/Justin Parker/Oskar Rindborg
[00:00.61]I've been tryna keep my distance
[00:03.52]But in an instant you break me down
[00:08.37]I know better than to want you
[00:11.17]But I succumb to you without a doubt
[00:15.30]Now the water is rising
[00:17.08]And I'm too tired to swim
[00:19.14]And my lungs just can't take it
[00:20.99]But I keep breathing you in so
[00:23.72]Tell me lies tell me painted truths
[00:27.13]Anything at all to keep me close to you
[00:31.45]Pull me under the way you do
[00:34.59]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you
[00:38.98]Oh tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you
[00:46.66]Oh tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you
[01:05.65]Oh tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you
[01:32.54]And now the water is rising
[01:34.31]And I'm too tired to swim
[01:36.44]And my lungs just can't take it
[01:38.29]But I keep breathing you in so
[01:43.19]Tell me lies tell me painted truths
[01:46.43]Anything at all to keep me close to you
[01:50.82]Pull me under the way you do
[01:53.96]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you
[02:09.47]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you
[02:24.98]Tonight I wanna drown in an ocean of you
tlyric:
[by:鱼腥耶]
[00:00.61]我努力与你保持距离
[00:03.52]但顷刻你将我防备击溃
[00:08.37]我很明白不能太依靠你
[00:11.17]但毫无疑问我向你屈服
[00:15.30]现在水流上涨
[00:17.08]我已疲于水中浮沉
[00:19.14]我的肺已无法承受
[00:20.99]但我会把你融进我的呼吸
[00:23.72]告诉我你的谎言告诉我被粉饰的真相
[00:27.13]无论说什么只要能让我更接近你
[00:31.45]把我卷入水底只为更接近你
[00:34.59]今晚我想沉溺于你的海洋
[00:38.98]今晚我想沉溺于你的海洋
[00:46.66]今晚我只想淹没在你的海洋
[01:05.65]今晚我只想淹没在你的海洋
[01:32.54]此刻水流上涨
[01:34.31]我已疲惫于此挣扎
[01:36.44]我的肺已无法承受
[01:38.29]但我会把你融进我的呼吸
[01:43.19]告诉我你的谎言 告诉我被粉饰的真相
[01:46.43]无论说什么只要能让我更接近你
[01:50.82]把我卷入水底只为更接近你
[01:53.96]今晚我想沉溺于你的海洋
[02:09.47]今晚我想沉溺于你的海洋
[02:24.98]今晚我想沉溺于你的海洋
